Implementing Spectral Clustering and Appliacation

Abstract

### Background ### Implementation - Algorithm for Spectral Clustering - Ideal Case - General Case ### Testing - Unit Test for Common Case - Unit Test for Edge Case ### Optimization - Vectorization - Cython - JIT (just-in-time compiling) - Improvement result ### Application and Comparison - Simulate Data - Application on Simulated Data - Compare with K-mean Algorithm ### Conclusion
